data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Värmland.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Värmland, Sweden
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Värmland a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 17 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Värmland, Sweden to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.
Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 136,875 cultural Christians in the state of Värmland to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord we pray you unite the 15,692 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Värmland.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Värmland, Sweden and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Värmland, Sweden has a population of 273,100.

We estimate Värmland has 15,692 people who might know Jesus, 136,875 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 120,534 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 17 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Värmland, Sweden to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist
